Dominant Nomad Chiefs: The Nomad Chiefs are in charge and your buildings provide additional effects
Impasse: Both sides are evenly matched and your buildings offer no additional bonuses

Fatandira’s Allegiance: Side with either her Tomb King God, Tutankhanut, or the people of Araby to earn rewards
Jaffar’s Revenge: Enact Jaffar’s revenge by uniting all of Araby and conquering Estalia, Tilea and Bretonnia. Each milestone grants various rewards
Sultan of the Seas: Destroy, sack, hunt treasure and raid to build your reputation at sea against other Vampire Coast factions and collect Sea Shanties
Has access to the Slave mechanic
